description: Led by Andhrímnir, the Clan of the Squirrel knows better than most how to enjoy the present moment but not at the expense of being farsighted and expert at managing resources.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Shootas, Blood & Teef
description: From the developers of the Guns, Gore and Cannoli franchise comes a new 2D run & gun platformer: Warhammer 40,000: Shootas, Blood & TEEF! Spearhead an Ork invasion, destroy the hive city and kill your warboss! ‘Ere we go!

name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos - Ultimate Edition
description: The ULTIMATE EDITION includes the base game THE DUNGEON OF NAHEULBEUK: THE AMULET OF CHAOS, the Season Pass of 3 DLC, a Goodies Pack and the game Soundtrack.

name: Sedomairi
description: Sedomairi is a first-person action horror game in which you wander through a randomly generated world that looks like an old Japanese house. Use the radio that can detect the distance and direction of the enemy to escape from the enemy, catch all the straw figures, and escape from the Sedo.

name: Escape to Mars
description: A game with inspirations like Pac-Man, Escape To Mars is a game about Action, puzzle and abilites require good tempo of player for collect all points.

name: A Walk Through Echoes
description: Accompany an old blind man on his journey in this challenging auditory platformer game. Test your precision platforming skills, reflexes, memory, and puzzle solving in order to progress.

name: Uchusen: Ultimate Ploid Battle
description: Uchūsen is a video game designed and programmed by Napoleón Malpica from NAPE GAMES and Manu Segura from 1985 ALTERNATIVO for 1 day in an internal GameJam at the Fnac’n Pixels 2019 event.

name: Saving Ghost
description: Get the ghost out of here under false charge. - Maybe it doesn't require much patience.

name: Mandacaru
description: Mandacaru is a hypercasual game where you match the seeds and harvest it to play a tetris-like subgame while the clock is ticking, so try to be the faster farmer!

name: Cliché Adventure
description: Cliché Adventure is an open world top down adventure game. It can be played as single player, or with a friend. The game has five unique regions joined by a hub world. Each area contains an over world, a cave system, and a temple to explore. There are Six main boss fights, and twenty mini bosses.

name: Splash Jump
description: Splash Jump - miniature arcade clicker game about jumping on platforms . Each click is a jump. Your task is to jumping and recruit points.

name: Fomalhaut Flowers
description: Go in search of rare flowers and uncover the terrible secret of Fomalhaut.

name: In Search Of...
description: You are trapped in a room and the only rational thing is to open a safe, in the hope of being able to escape. Surely you were looking for something...

name: CorePiercer
description: Because of the increase in solar radiation, the surface of the earth will soon be unable to sustain life, and people will need to move to the ground in the future. Therefore, scientists have developed high-tech trains that can shuttle underground efficiently.

name: Imperial Grace
description: Imperial Grace is a unique mix of romance, medieval intrigue, and strategy. Play as the new Empress of Calidya through a visual novel rife with ambition and deceit. Make choices that will change your fate and that of your nation, rule wisely to make your Empire prosper, and find love along the way!

name: Sep's Diner
description: Welcome to Sep’s Diner, the new burger restaurant of which YOU are the Chef! Will it really become the best burger in town? It’s up to you now!

name: FireJumpers Inferno
description: FireJumpers Inferno is a 3D cooperative multiplayer wildland firefighting game on an epic scale! With over 3.5 billion pixels of GIS data mapping out the western United States, it's really a professional training tool disguised as a game!

name: Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of milk
description: A sequel to Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk. Dive into demented and bizarre world once again and help the girl become a little happier.

name: New Homestead
description: New Homestead is an online turn-based, strategy game. To build up a functional economy, you have to develop your cities and conquer your enemies on a procedurally generated map!

name: Fear the Dark Unknown: James
description: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

name: Riot At World
description: The world is under occupation because of humans tried to colonized mars and only one city left and unfortunetly it is colonized by aliens. The last humans of world are trying to get their independence from aliens.

name: Poly Gangs
description: PolyGangs: A 3-person sandbox world action game in LowPolly style. A gangster simulator in a large American city. The heater will be able to choose whether to become a felon or an undercover policeman.

name: Electrodash
description: Electrodash is a die & retry where you play as a cube that must reach the finish line by bouncing off walls strewn with obstacles.

name: King God Domain
description: It is an innovative WEBGAME that can satisfy both casual and competitive players. It integrates some popular gameplay on the market. It can be said to learn from the best of others and create a game with its own characteristics. Turn-based card recruitment battle: Let players

name: Bring me a man, Santa
description: Meet some guys from the Male Doll family through a short and free music game. Feel the boys' bodies, Remove their clothes, and don't forget to say: Santa, could you bring me a man?! It's Xmas time!

name: Geometrix
description: Geometrix is a puzzle-platformer. You play as one of four geometric shapes to make your way through the level. Each form has it's own abilities and restrictions. There are restrictions for each level, such as a limited number of color-switches or form-switches.

name: Into the Abyss
description: You are Sonja, a student of necromancy fighting to rid the world of a terrible illness that's taking the lives of all mankind. Fight alongside a zombie, a witch and even death in this exciting journey of persistence, friendship and determination!

name: Carebotz
description: Carebotz is mixed the classic arcade space combat with Metroidvania elements. As a humble maintenance droid BIBZ, your daily tasks might appear mundane, but when the main computer awakes from hibernation, nothing is what it seems!

name: Radioactive Dwarfs: Evil From the Sewers
description: Blast through the sewers in Radioactive Dwarfs! Retro top-down shooter with NES-style pixel graphics and chiptune music. Help armed heroine search for her brother in underground dwarven settlement. Many enemies, items, secrets, and bonus levels. Thrilling adventure awaits!

name: Il
description: Robots invaded the earth, you have to explore their ship to eliminate them. A horror game based on an attempt to survive inside a space ship

name: Northend Tower Defense
description: Live real time battle, micromanagement and survive the battle with your army of your chosen, Live with mayhem and explosions.

name: Stabby Cats
description: Fighting your fellow kitties with your incredible agility and arsenal of sharp weaponry in this 2D action game! Toss knives, climb around mansions, and stab your friends to see who will be rewarded the coveted golden yarn!

name: Dread Delusion
description: Dread Delusion is an open world RPG brimming with strange places and dark perils. Carve your own path through the flying continents of a shattered land. Discover curious towns, unearth occult secrets, master powerful magic - and change the world through your choices.

name: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
description: A Resource Management Adventure Game -- Play as Vaan, a demon lord who has had his power sealed, and has been banished to the world of mortals. Make friends and work towards regaining your former glory!

name: Malone In Nightmares
description: Malone is not a brave boy, and there is always a strange, mysterious monster lurking in the shadow of his nightmares. Tonight, Malone will have to face his nightmare. Enter the world of Malone and step into a 2D platform adventure born in the mind of a little boy.

name: FarmZone
description: The goal in FarmZone is to survive and protect your farm. You are just a farmer in the world full of zombies. You have to fight them to protect yourself and your farm. Travel the open world, explore new towns and grow your farm.

name: Essential Mayhem
description: A casual, cartoony, money-management game set during a terrifying pandemic. Race to restock shelves before customers leave unfulfilled; all while avoiding sick people along the way.

name: Into the Midnight
description: Into the Midnight is a halloween themed co-op multiplayer survival game full of mystey and fantasy. Team up with your friends, build a base, hunt creatures and survive one more day. Gather resources to craft items and structures that prepares you to surprises.

name: Droid404
description: Complete an adventurous quest while parkouring through various enemies as a robot! Leap from platform to platform while dodging obstacles in this pixelated side-scrolling platformer. Fight bosses and uncover hidden areas while discovering the truth about your existence. Good luck, Droid404.

name: Galaxy X
description: Embark on an epic journey in this hardcore Multiplayer RPG! As a Galactic Cadet, you and your Combat Squad of friends must brave hostile worlds in search of valuable loot and resources. Craft powerful gear, slay otherworldly creatures, and save the galaxy.

name: Cheese Killer
description: Cheesy Killer is a beat 'em up with the possibility of a cooperative passage in which you will constantly try to pick up coins from the corpses of enemies before your friend.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Magnetrix
description: Assemble magnetic towers by stacking pieces from opposite poles, to enlighten a electrifying hexagonal board.

name: See you: A brief exile
description: may this swordless adventure leads you to a peaceful new world

name: Walden Horde
description: You are right in the middle of political conflicts and hot war in a kingdom that draws its strength from its ruthlessness. Fight against the ruthless wizards and great warriors in the Walden Kingdom. Revolutionise the fantasy/medieval world by honing your combat and diplomacy skills!

name: Markerboard Jungle: Frogs
description: Markerboard Jungle: Frogs is an amphibian-focused, science-based, entertaining & educational, single-player survival game and wildlife sim. Explore the lives of a variety of frogs immersed in the world of this fascinating creature.

name: Beautiful Mystic Defenders
description: Beautiful Mystic Defenders is a tactical tower defense, romantic visual novel game where you are the savior of the mystic realm's incredibly gorgeous ladies. Build towers wisely, level up heroines, obtain upgrades, defeat hordes of monsters and immerse in a stimulating harem love story!

name: Handy Machines VR
description: Send the balls into the hat. You can go through the levels or create your own ways according to your ideas.

name: Sweet Dungeon
description: If you are a man, you can go down 100 floors. Come challenge! There are beautiful demons, nurses and dancers waiting for you. If you pass the test successfully, unexpected things will happen!

name: Blackwind
description: Blackwind is a top-down sci-fi action game that puts you in the shoes of a teenager trapped inside a prototype battle armor suit during an alien invasion. Face off against enemies, cut through their ranks, and fight back to stop a planetary invasion.

name: Sisterhood
description: SISTERHOOD is a third-person shooting game that focuses on classic shooting and precision mechanics. Fight against anything that threatens humanity. Or rather, whatever the church says that threatens humanity. You play as one of the sisters, involved in special missions.

name: Mars First Logistics
description: Mars First Logistics is a physics-based open-world simulation game, where you design, build and control your own mechanical creations to deliver important cargo between colony stations on Mars. Earn credits, unlock new technology, upgrade your vehicle and tame the hostile Martian landscape.

name: Meteor Storm
description: Welcome back to 1996! This shared screen space shooter is the perfect 4-player competitive game for some casual fun!

name: Jumping Knight
description: Jumping Knight is a platformer game with an atmospheric-dark world and a lot of challenging levels.

name: Minesweeper Classy
description: A modern and stylish take on a classic logic puzzle game. Play the classic minesweeper levels, beat unique level layouts and challenges, or create and share your own level designs.

name: Living together with Fox Demon
description: You encountered a snowstorm while climbing a snowy mountain. You saved an injured fox demon in the snow, and brought her back home to start a sweet life together ....

name: Gunderdome
description: Gunderdome is an FPS Survival game. Fight endless waves of enemies to achieve the highest score. Once in the main menu you have the option to view the settings and how the game works or jump straight into the action. Choose from 3 maps to hop into and test yourself against endless waves of enemies.

name: Agoraphobia: Knock Knock
description: Agoraphobia" Knock Knock" is a psychological survival horror game.

name: Mage of the Olekta Desert
description: A stealth survival RPG. Accepting a request from the adventurers guild, Aisha must make her way through the dangerous Lekta Ruins in order to find the great mage, Lowen.

name: Field Survivor
description: Top-down zombie shooter game where you survive against hordes of zombies. Every wave the number of enemies encreases. Hey, tell me you have enough bullets, don't you?

name: Neolithic: To the End
description: A modern-day open-world RPG about a secret world. With the help of your companions, some demons, some cats, and any supernatural entities you can bend to your will, all the different ways to solve problems, you may still fail to save the world. Life is simply unfair. But, will you stop trying?

name: World End Coed
description: 在河北省，核大战后孤独的世界末日，机器人守卫在尘封的考场。 长久的等待之后，全国最后一名考生探出了路口。 再过一年的六月六，高考结束之后，在这个一片荒芜的世界，两人又该何去何从……

name: Space Craft
description: Your ship crashed on the unknown planet BURA 0-5.1. This planet is not yet unknown to your race and who knows what awaits you here!

name: Super Maze Labyrinth
description: It's time to relax and enjoy the art of finding your way out of the mazes of Super Maze Labyrinth. Park the haste, enjoy the music and the experience through the 100 mazes divided into 5 visual themes that this game offers you.

name: Tournament Paintball VR
description: Tournament style speedball in VR focusing on realism, and fun.

name: The Secret of Retropolis
description: The Secret of Retropolis is a VR narrative game of a new kind, a blend of classic point-and-click adventure with immersive cinematography. Embody the witty protagonist of a film noir plot. Meet unforgettable characters. Solve puzzles. Lose yourself in the retro-futuristic atmosphere.

name: Legacy: Witch Island 3
description: Your next hidden object adventure on Witch Island is about to begin! It’s up to you now, to take on these unique puzzle challenges to stop the evil witch and save two worlds from certain destruction!

name: Portability
description: Portability is a 2D physics game where you teleport and destroy objects to solve puzzles.

name: Save the Date
description: Time is broken, and only the Union's finest Temporal Mechanic can save it. Once he clocks in to work, that is. In this deep space precision platformer's Prologue Episode, manipulate time to overcome deadly obstacles in a race against the clock to reach the Mayan Temple and Save the Date.

name: Heroic Armored Company
description: Hero Armored Company is a thrilling modern tank war game. Real battle scenes, huge maps and advanced graphics technology will give you an exciting battlefield experience.

name: Hentai Femdom Sim: Femdom University
description: Femdom University is an Open-World Sim-Game which is all about Femdom. You are a student in a university of dominant females where you have to take care of yourself and survive. You could go out but there are also sexy Monster Girls who try to seduce you too.

name: Inua: A Story in Ice and Time
description: Inua is a mystical point & click adventure about three protagonists with intertwined fates, living decades apart in the Great North. Manipulate their minds and restore the original balance of life.

name: Condition 24
description: Condition 24 - an epic third person open-world shooter adventure game, set in a rich tropical island setting with a complex mysterious underworld. Battle against elite special forces and the demons they protect. Coming soon to Steam.

name: XPock
description: Shoot, Fly, Open, Win. Shoot the aliens, avoid obstacles and dodge the bullets in order to get the achievements you deserve.

name: Snapshot
description: Magic and science. Past and future. But what of the present?

name: Caste: The Secret Of Devon
description: In "Caste - The Secret Of Devon" you play an aspirant of the Water Caste, who was sent to live in Devon, a town of the Earth Caste, for at least one year. There you have to proove that you are willing to join the Water Caste.

name: Lord of the Click 2
description: Orcs,goblins and other evil spirits are getting closer, and very soon they will get so close that it will simply be impossible to get out of the kingdom. The king himself is ready to stop the army of dishonor. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

name: Satanic Panic 666
description: Descend into hell and destroy the cursed tapes with occult music known as †HEAVY METAL† to save our children's souls. On your way you will face Satan himself.

name: Puzzle Cafe VR
description: Puzzle Cafe VR is a relaxing jigsaw puzzle game made for VR. Relax in a nice cafe and solve some jigsaw puzzles, complete challenges and upgrade the cafe scenery.

name: Onder
description: Alone and underground.

name: Halloween Patchwork Trick or Treat
description: Trick or treat? No tricks! Assemble 120 unique jigsaw puzzles in Halloween Patchwork Trick or Treat and get a whole sack of Halloween treats!

name: Rusa Odyssey
description: RUSA Odyssey is an exploration game set in the post-apocalypse world. Alone, a deer journey to find a way out of the MAZE. discover stories & mysteries along the way.

name: Burrow burrow
description: Build a town in a magical but dangerous wilderness as you recruit different animal dudes and grow your community from a few weirdos around a campfire to a whole village!

name: Waves of Rotting Flesh
description: A wave based FPS where you defend a barricaded house against increasing hordes of the dead.

name: Infected zone
description: In this open world game, you need to survive in the city where a virus just broke out. You could obtain materials for survival and fight by gathering, sowing and trading. Find more fellow players to complete tasks with you to unlock more areas. Finally escape the infected city if you are lucky!

name: Arena of Ruins
description: It consists of Lan mode multiplaying and several simple acts of single mode.

name: In Space No One Can Hear You Clean
description: Velocity-driven arcade action!

name: Death Wish
description: Embark on an adventure as a villain who just wants to follow the script ... Die in the end for the Hero of History. Use your telekinetic powers to control elements of the scenario and defeat unworthy enemies. Do you think you can do it?

name: Folkloric Excursion
description: In this adventure game, you need your math skills to survive and protect the tourists. Don't let the forest creatures get near them!

name: Soulbound Steel
description: Embody a necromancer and slash your way through knights and castles. Combine skills of undead warriors on the fly. Summon powerful demons and slay colossal deities in a hack n’ slash that offers a brand new combat system to be mastered.

name: Mission Biotech
description: Stop the spread of deadly viruses using real biotechnology concepts, procedures and tools.

name: Trolley Problem, Inc.
description: In The Trolley Company, players are pitted against many philosophical questions, varying from well known in pop culture to cutting edge AI, even those only found in textbooks, packaged in a comical and thought-provoking journey.

name: Tube Rolling
description: A fast-paced arcade ball rolling in a tube in which you have to dodge obstacles, unlock new skins, and constantly improve your latest score.

name: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics
description: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics is the island of arcade skateboarding fun. Build & Compete in the Obstacle Arena, or fly to the finish in the speedrun track! However you get your wormcoin, you are guaranteed to have hours of fun. Full level editor with up & downloading. And hours of great music.

name: Vladik Brutal
description: Fight under the onslaught of mutated monsters, obsessed soldiers and even darker bosses. Just try to survive and find out what to do next in this life, simultaneously tearing your enemies to pieces.

name: First Floor
description: A first person audio horror game.

name: Auto Island
description: Completely open world. Just ride your cars, overcome mountain landscapes and forests. Find new cars.

name: Sigma Impact
description: A physics-based combat roguelite set in a dungeon of glass

name: You You N Music
description: Rhythm game or rhythm action is a genre of music-themed action video game that challenges

name: Tantal
description: Tantal is a fast-paced match 3 platformer with coin collecting.

name: Avoidvania
description: AvoidVania is a 2D game Top-down Runner / Metroidvania taking place in a medieval-fantastic universe.

name: Goalgetter
description: The first First-Person Football Manager gives you the chance to make your dream, of becoming a top striker in one of the major European leagues, come true. You are a young and very gifted football player. Now you are getting the chance to play in the first league.

name: Paitan Small Town
description: Paitan small town, a place for you to enjoy the game!

name: Hello Puppets: Midnight Show
description: “Hello Puppets: Midnight Show” is a stealth horror adventure set in the 1980s on the set of a children’s TV show. You are a master puppet maker whose prized creations--the Handeemen--have come to life and are hunting you. Play hide and seek against advanced AI that forces you to adapt and improvise.

name: Atria Valkyrie
description: Operate disc hovercrafts that absorb enemy bullets to charge up your weapon. This is a vertical shoot 'em up game. Correct timing of your attack and choice of bullet determines your survival or defeat.

name: Galaxy Guardian Royale
description: This game takes place in space, its classical Battle Royale mode. 50 players joining battle around solar system. Last player wins.

name: Dragon Blast: Crazy Action Super Hero Game
description: Immerse yourself in one of the arcade action dragon game, with cool characters, amazing, stunning visual and particle effects and epic action that turn every action into a real blockbuster action movie.

name: The Craft of the Samurai
description: A short visual novel inspired from the works by the masters of Japanese cinema: Masaki Kobayashi, Akira Kurosawa, Hideo Gosha.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Flip Match
description: An evolution of Solid Match and next on Hanoi Puzzles series. Assemble towers by fliping pieces to get the right color on top, stack pieces of the same color to assemble a tower on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Valletine against Darkne
description: A 2D platform adventure game, in which you must dodge enemy obstacles and pass mobile platforms and various types of terrain that will make your journey more difficult

name: 玛法传奇
description: Sin descripción

name: Parfait Remake: Complete Limited Edition
description:
Parfait Remake is a Bishoujo romance visual novel about two cafes competing for business. It is also a remake of Parfait: Chocolat Second Brew.

The Complete Limited Edition of Parfait Remake comes with:
- copy of Parfait Remake
- Especially drawn B2 tapestry
- Special visual booklet
- Lycee Overture PR Card

name: Sexy Sniper
description: Sexy Sniper is a dynamic shooting game set in a ruined desert city. You have to carry out an operation to rescue the hot hostages and destroy all the terrorists.

name: Edibles
description: Escape the kitchen and find yourself in an ever ending world of beauty and woes! Lots of puzzles to solve to avoid ending up either squashed, eaten blended or just thrown away in the trash! Where can a tomato find peace? What is a tomato's purpose in life? You decide!

name: To Save Humanity From Virus
description: To Save humanity From Virus is a building game where you are on a different planet trying to get resources to create a vaccine. The virus hit the earth and the only way to save humanity is to gather resources from the different planet.

name: Warrecs 2
description: You are a small planet in the universe. With time, you're losing mass, therefore you have to eat smaller planets to survive. The rule is the bigger planets eat the smaller.

name: Mint Works
description: Mint Works is a 20 minute light worker placement game, great for new and experienced players alike. Use your workers to build plans, gain extra abilities and accrue victory points faster than your opponents!

name: Cardbot
description: Cardbot is an action-platformer game about traveling through dimensions to restore the world!

name: Village businessman
description: In Village businessman, you play as a man who came to the village for a vacation, but everything was taken away from him. your task is to help the main character: get resources, sell, buy new cars-with which transportation will be easier, businesses-that will bring you income.

name: Neon Nights
description: Get a glimpse of Metropolis 12's seedy back-alley nightlife in the sci-fi cyberpunk visual novel, NEON NIGHTS!

name: Fuyu Kiss: Complete Limited Edition
description:
Fuyu Kiss is a romance visual novel. In the snowy landscape you give me a first kiss.

The Limited Edition of Fuyu Kiss includes:
- Fuyu Kiss
- B2 tapestry
- PR card

name: Aka
description: Find inner peace in a small, open-world game. On these carefully handcrafted islands, you can take a nap on a giant monster, feed baby dragons, take care of the fauna and flora... ...but demons from your past might come back to remind you what you want to forget.

name: Zombeer: Delivery Mission
description: Zombeer: Delivery Mission is a 2D Shooter, where you need to save the world by delivering special beers in a Zombie apocalypse. With a Beer Thrower you will need to fight your way through ever-increasing hordes of zombies against the clock to deliver the beers that will save humanity!

name: Sweet Shine
description: This is an exciting casual draw line game. Players can draw different line segments in the game level to direct the flow of balls into the finish hole to complete the level. The 3 cute girls have different story, costumes and props.Enjoy the game and reveal the secret desires of these cute girls.

name: Baby Goat Billy
description: Deckbuilding RPG with a strong narrative. Immerse yourself in an ancient world of goat mythology and fight monsters in a turn-based combat. Discover awesome deck combos, learn new skills and overcome dungeon obstacles.

name: The Loneliest Summer
description: A cinematic slice of life adventure.

name: Office Simulator
description: Try to turn a small garage start-up into a large company.

name: Bird
description: You are a bird, you are free in this small place, but you can't get out, all you can do is fly around.

name: Berries Challenge
description: Berries Challenge is a berries hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy the nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather berries.

name: Monsters, Briefcase and Road
description: Colorful bitemap, which takes place in the world of monsters. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of travel through different places of the world to achieve the goal of the hero. Destroy enemies standing in your way. And get to the truth in the game Monsters, Briefcase and Road.

name: Whispers from Within: Moving On
description: You are the main character in this Twilight Zone-inspired experience. Tragedy has struck your family, but you must find a way to move on. Can you unlock the memories that are keeping you trapped? Can you free yourself from the past? Can you do what is needed to finally move on?

name: Safe Squares
description: Safe Squares is a chess-based puzzle game designed to hone your tactical skills. Each puzzle features enemy pieces on a board; your goal is to spot the unguarded square. Great for novice players and experts alike. Choose your difficulty level and sharpen your game!

name: Protocol Endfall
description: You are the captain of a space ship lost in time and space. You receive an order for delivery of a special cargo from an organization that has been considered destroyed for hundreds of years. What are your next steps?

name: Starry Makino
description: The universe is full of unknown and magical for mankind. At present, our understanding of the gorgeous universe is mainly derived from the study of the invisible universe, the vast sky, the mysterious constellation, the beautiful aurora phenomenon, all show the infinite charm of the universe.

name: Spacegirl 2038
description: Spacegirl 2038 is a fast paced, high energy arcade style shooter. Save your sister and her crew, they're depending on you!

name: Star Steel
description: "Star Steel" is a vertical scrolling shooter with a top view. Defend our planet from deadly alien forces.

name: Post-Soviet Yandere
description: A horror game with crafting elements. A little girl needs to perform 7 magical rituals, and at the same time avoid the revenge of post-Soviet evil spirits.

name: Way of Heroes
description: You have to choose a hero and go through the dungeon levels of the city of Vorms. Collect the unworthy pages of the Book of the Dead and destroy it. Level up the hero and get new magic abilities. Play with other guys on two joysticks and have fun.

name: Sky Seeker
description: SkySeeker is a game that aims to drop the enemy at the target location. You can feel very exhilarating when you can blow away your enemies, so please play.

name: The Death of Zoe
description: Immerse yourself in an adventure of exploration and stealth like no other in which you are Zoe, a lemur who must escape death. But it will not be easy, death itself has prepared a path full of enemies to avoid Do you dare to escape death?

name: Mori's Nightmare: Hide and seek
description: Become Mori and Avoid the scary nurse! Escape from the hospital!

name: Last Gang Standing
description: Gather up a gang of your friends, build a base, add a factory, add some turrets, add teleporters, doors, foxholes and decorations. Arm yourselves to the teeth and go forth to raze, loot and t-bag all who stand against you. Be the Last Gang Standing

name: Crown Land
description: In an alternate history, romance and chivalry sweep across the American continents as kings and queens wage wars for the ultimate throne. This epic visual novel features an alternate Earth fantasy, a large and complex cast, and a gripping plot that will hook you in.

name: Cosmic Zephyr DX
description: Cosmic Zephyr DX is a fast-paced 3D bullet hell game, where you duel with angels as you soar through space.

name: Brightblood
description: An Action Adventure where you play as Akarra, the last surviving member of the Akaii race. Grow stronger by plunging into the buried sanctums left behind by Akaii masters and proving your strength to each unique warrior that lies within.

name: Beckoned
description: A Meticulously Handcrafted Epic Adventure, with a Real-Time Twist to JRPG Turn Base Combat Systems. Master the environment and challenge morale-crushing bosses with the help from majiq Loden Shards found along the way.

name: Degenerate Souls
description: It's a tactical shooting survival game,

name: Tiny Toy Tanks
description: In Tiny Toy Tanks you are in control of a small blue tank. Your Goal is to destroy all the opposing tanks in 40+ hand crafted levels. Opposing tanks have different AI with different strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, every level has many other mechanics like TNT, Magnets and more.

name: Pyxel Knight
description: A pixel art co-op Metroidvania-Maker game! Jump, Slash and loot enemies to earn and find badges to power up your player.

name: The Den of Worms
description: The Den of Worms is an open world exploration game where you must enter the Astral Plane on an esoteric quest to save your dreams from being eaten. On your way you will grow plants, hatch worm eggs, restore the life to towns, battle monsters, and uncover secrets.

name: My Little Prince: A Jigsaw Puzzle Tale
description: “But eyes are blind. You have to look with the heart.” A jigsaw puzzle game to remember a beloved classic story. Contains illustrations created by Katia Numakura with inspiration from “The Little Prince” by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, and from RPGs.

name: GunWorld VR
description: Fully physics based gun simulator. Build any gun possible - limitless attachments and options. 100% physical hands with realistic handling - just like real life. Play multiple mini-games and modes, and battle over 100 enemies on a single map in War Mode!

name: A Way to Die
description: Enter the human body with A Way To Die! Play as a disease that attempts to infect its host by contaminating organs and mutating! Discover new ways to win every time you play with all the different diseases!

name: Thukothea Defender
description: A strategic tower-defense where you control powerfull drones. Unlock new tower and use specific technologies to defend your base on Thukothea!

name: Cute animal jigsaw puzzle
description: The puzzles shouldn't be complex, they should be fun! Relax and have fun making beautiful images of cute animals.

name: Retrowave Hexon
description: RETROWAVE style puzzle, hexagons, complex tasks, great music, lots of levels. There is something to think about.

name: Absurbia: A Trashy Satire of Suburban Outcries
description: An experimental sound novel all about spreading the cancer of transgression and trash. Read through the annals of human excrement that glorifies the worst of humanity. Nothing can save this underground Cult Abomination! Be anointed by utter anarchic depravity from every hole of your wet body!

name: Wolfriders A Sniper Adventure
description: Wolfriders is a sniper game with a comic book style storytelling. Read the comic book chapters and play the short sniper and assault levels to unveil the immersive story.

name: Blue fencer Resurrection
description: The Devil's Castle has 8 stages full of powerful enemies.Invincible dash slash, powerful slash, 6 types of sub weapons.Make full use of various techniques to overcome the labyrinth !!

name: Encode
description: Encode is a dystopian story driven first person shooter. The game takes the player through a journey that explores conflicting ideologies within an open-world cyberpunk atmosphere.

name: Amazing Superhero Squad
description: How easy you think it is to solve all the problems of a cursed city and not go insane? Lead a team of superheroes, save Storborg City from looming disasters and beat your dishonourable rivals. Amazing Superhero Squad is a vivid superhero corporation sim.

name: Don't Crash: The Political Game
description:
Warning! This game crashes when you die. It's the point of the game.
Game includes shooting 3d Sprites. FPS shooting, various guns, and political humor.

name: Chaos of Fallen City
description: Chaos of Fallen City is a deck building game with rougelike elements. The rich characters and cards will bring infinite replay value to the game. Leading to the chaotic forbidden city, use the combination of cards and the power of talents and magic weapons to suppress this evil that is just around the corner!

name: Hypnagogia: Boundless Dreams
description: Meet colorful characters, discover mysterious secrets, and reassemble the fractured remains of an ethereal crystal as you explore a series of abstract worlds based on dreams, nightmares, and the places in between.

name: Brobot
description: Manipulate gravity and avoid the hazards whilst you race to restore order to your home world. Brobot is an exciting 2.5D platformer with an FPS aesthetic.

name: Dungeon Display
description: Create unique RPG maps easily and effectively and then play through them with your friends!

name: Brutal Wizardry
description: Brutal Wizardry is a VR magic shooter with randomly generated levels. Use telekinesis, magical weapons and mechanisms to destroy your enemies.

name: Laser Droplets
description: Laser Droplets is a mixture of shoot ‘em up, bullet-hell, arcade styled, 2D game. It consists of 16 mini stages, each with a unique stage boss.

name: Ruby Heart
description: Ruby Heart is a "Visual Novel / Otome game" of fantasy adventure with a strong focus in drama and romance. The protagonist, Celty Loweell, travels to a magical underground kingdom in search for a very important person.

name: Pro Table Tennis VR
description: Pro table tennis VR is a single-player table tennis simulation game. The game has realistic ball physics that should feel pretty close to reality. The game also features a 'pro' mode where you can turn on or off.

name: Loving You Fully
description: A short, free visual novel about body positivity and learning to love yourself.

name: The Runaway Feijoao
description: The Runaway Feijoão is a casual indie game inspired by the old Tom & Jerry game, bringing you to difficult and addictive gameplay through the human digestive system.

name: Swaying Girl
description: 这是一个交互性小说的游戏，包含多个独立的小故事。画面精美，操作简单。

name: ClanRivals: Vikings
description: ClanRivals: Vikings is a free to play player vs. player MOBA game featuring fast paced 3v3 bloody viking battles.

name: Bus stop in the fog
description: A bus trip is a journey not a destination. You bought your first sailing boat with your savings of the last 5 years and you find yourself stranded on an island in the Bermuda sea. You must take a very scary bus ride to get off the island ... but will the bus take you off the island?

name: Harvest Island: Beginnings
description: Play the first chapter of Harvest Island, an upcoming pixel-art, cute, semi-farming simulator set on a remote island. Take on the role of Will and help your sister catch a raccoon to offer to the gods. Inspired by Stardew Valley, Harvest Moon, and Rune Factory.

name: Aquarium Designer
description: Aquarium Designer gives you an opportunity to create an aquarium of your dreams! Become a professional whose job is to design it, build it, and fill it with the various marine wildlife! All types, all sizes - your creativity is your only limit!

name: Enherjar Synergy
description: A Tourney FPS designed by eSports professional, Cloud Darkson, with the intention of creating "Arena Shooter Perfection". Our mechanics are highly rewarding to both individual skill and team-based strategy to be the zenith experience within our genre. *Online Hack-free Tournaments

name: The Trader
description: Your main goal is to keep your shop running by trading with wanderers, whilst keeping the enemies at bay. The game features a fairly simple randomly generated adventure system, and enables the player to generate a new location every time they wish to explore and find loot to sell/use.

name: Lollipop!
description: LOLLIPOP! Is an addicting hentai puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In LOLLIOP! You will find many bright levels with hot girls and various visual effects, from this game you will just have a real BOOM!

name: PumPum
description: PumPum Is an addicting hentai puzzle game with many hot girls that you must collect! Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations!

name: Quantaar
description: Quantaar is a fast-paced VR hero melee combining first & third-person view. Players can experience the intensity of melee combat, develop unique play styles, or just meet new friends at bars!

name: Selini
description: Collect the lost memories of the protagonist in a vast and ruined world, filled with ancient mysteries, minimal Cycladic islands and a forgotten metropolis that holds a dark secret.

name: Distant Transmission
description: Create nonsensical radio shows with your friends online!

name: Capsule Hotel Simulator
description: Atmospheric experience for those wishing to get in a capsule hotel to catch the vibes of cyberpunky low level of life bordering with coziness

name: Playback Trauma: The Beach
description: After a long and harrowing day, you have come to the beach to unwind. Something is different about tonight though. It's just the beach, there's nothing out there. Right?

name: Fuck the Police
description: In the near future, protests in several major cities across the country have taken a turn for the worse. Clashes between activists and authorities turn violent. You've been blamed for the death of Chief of Police. Fight your way to survival while every cop on the force is trying to hunt you down.

name: LaserShotz
description: LaserShotz is an online PvP competitive arena shooter! Compete for the best rating on the leaderboards!

name: Diarrhea Don
description: You only have one objective in the game and that is to poo on your unsuspecting targets. Go through the story of Don and get the message that this game sends to you.

name: Hats Are Not Allowed
description: A FighterRPG set in an absurd Robo-Authoritarian society. The forbidden headwear has awakened your consciousness. Defeat all who come against you in tense duels. Ignite the fires of an uprising, lead your forces in battle and decide the fate of Genu Corp.

name: Foxy's Adventure
description: You must save your lover. To do this, you will have to fight against an evil monsters.You have to collect all gems and cherries in each stages. You will travel through 5 Worlds and fight against Bosses. It won't be an easy journey. So get ready for some real challenge. Good Luck little Fox!
